title: Rock Paper Scissors
original_name: ロック・ペーパー・シザーズ
sinopse: Masumasu Academy, an Academic City floating in the Pacific, is home to children with mysterious powers known as "fiction." "Fiction" grants improve their physical prowess, as well as additional capacity. What happens when a cap of time, Kazuma, meets a beautiful girl with the ability to move at the speed of light, he knows and is looking for him?
